title: 那个 有没有1.15.2防爆插件
author: csl33288383
txt_content: 服务器装了精英怪插件   精英怪会破坏地形 一炸 一个坑  有没有大佬介绍个防爆插件  1.15.2能用的

replies.author: csl33288383
replies.txt_content:
结城希亚 发表于 2020-4-28 20:26
输入/gamerule mobGriefing false不行吗
这玩意输入 村民不繁殖了呀

replies.author: csl33288383
replies.txt_content:
csl33288383 发表于 2020-4-28 20:34
这玩意输入 村民不繁殖了呀
这不是副本。。。普通怪变成 精英怪的..

replies.author: Azitate
replies.txt_content:
[安全]AntiExplosion——小而实用的防爆插件！[全版本]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-501794-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)
试试这个？

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
csl33288383 发表于 2020-4-28 21:07
大佬 顺便帮我看下这个 谢谢大佬

[20:54:46 ERROR]: --- DO NOT REPORT THIS TO PAPER - THIS IS NOT A  ...
删除world里region的r.-6.-7.mca，或者你亲自去-2832 0 -3264这个坐标看看
有东西卡线程了

replies.author: csl33288383
replies.txt_content:
结城希亚 发表于 2020-4-28 21:11
删除world里region的r.-6.-7.mca，或者你亲自去-2832 0 -3264这个坐标看看
有东西卡线程了 ...
就一块原始区块。。。。。。。。

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
csl33288383 发表于 2020-4-28 21:14
就一块原始区块。。。。。。。。
偶发性的不用管
就当特性（

怕崩服的话在spigot.yml里把timeout-time改为9999999
最多卡一下，但不会崩服

replies.author: csl33288383
replies.txt_content:
结城希亚 发表于 2020-4-28 21:15
偶发性的不用管
就当特性（
就是  偶尔来卡顿一下

replies.author: liaoxu2003
replies.txt_content: 你这个情况我也遇到过 最后我是去ess config将各种爆炸给限制了

replies.author: liaoxu2003
replies.txt_content:
protect:

  # General physics/behavior modifications.
  prevent:
    lava-flow: false
    water-flow: false
    water-bucket-flow: false
    fire-spread: true
    lava-fire-spread: false
    flint-fire: false
    lightning-fire-spread: true
    portal-creation: false
    tnt-explosion: false
    tnt-playerdamage: false
    tnt-minecart-explosion: false
    tnt-minecart-playerdamage: false
    fireball-explosion: false
    fireball-fire: false
    fireball-playerdamage: false
    witherskull-explosion: false
    witherskull-playerdamage: false
    wither-spawnexplosion: false
    wither-blockreplace: false
    creeper-explosion: false
    creeper-playerdamage: false
    creeper-blockdamage: true
    enderdragon-blockdamage: true
    enderman-pickup: true
    villager-death: false
    # Monsters won't follow players.
    # permission essentials.protect.entitytarget.bypass disables this.
    entitytarget: false
    # Prevent certain transformations.
    transformation:
      # Prevent creepers becoming charged when struck by lightning.
      charged-creeper: false
      # Prevent villagers becoming zombie villagers.
      zombie-villager: false
      # Prevent zombie villagers being cured.
      villager: false
      # Prevent villagers becoming witches when struck by lightning.
      witch: false
      # Prevent pigs becoming zombie pigmen when struck by lightning.
      zombie-pigman: false
      # Prevent zombies turning into drowneds, and husks turning into zombies.
      drowned: false
      # Prevent mooshrooms changing colour when struck by lightning.
      mooshroom: false
    # Prevent the spawning of creatures.复制代码
找到保护这行 然后自行限制

replies.author: 专业团队
replies.txt_content:
推荐使用世界保护搬运贴:https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-648625-1-1.html
安全省心更放心.

推荐这个插件 我也是1.15.2 我也在用
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... ge=1&tid=850425
